trans-unit.source: Represents a selection control with a drop-down list that can be shown or hidden by clicking the arrow on the control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> allows the user to select an item from a drop-down list or optionally to enter new text in the text box of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>可讓使用者從下拉式清單中選取項目或選擇性地在控制項的文字方塊中輸入新的文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> properties specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> behaves when the user does one of the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性會指定如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>使用者執行下列其中之一時的行為：

trans-unit.source: Enters a string to select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 輸入要選取的項目中的字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Selects part of the string that is in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 選取 [文字] 方塊中的字串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Copies or pastes a value into the text box.
trans-unit.target: 複製或將值貼到文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的動作，使用者可以和不能採用依據的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `true`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> 是 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `false`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> 是 `false`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `true`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> 是 `true`

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -無法選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: - Can copy the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box, but cannot paste a string into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以複製中的字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字，但無法貼上到字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: - Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -可以輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: - Can copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以複製或貼上在字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `false`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> 是 `false`

trans-unit.source: - Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法複製或貼上在字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法複製或貼上在字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> property has an effect only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性有影響才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, so it can display content other than simple strings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，因此它可以顯示簡單字串以外的內容。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> that contains a list of images.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，其中包含一份映像。

trans-unit.source: When you have content other than strings in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, a nonsensical string might appear in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> when the drop-down list is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 當您有中字串以外的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，字串，也可能會出現在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>時隱藏下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: To display a string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> when it contains non-string items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.TextPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示的字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>當它包含非字串的項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.TextPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ComboBox Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂 ComboBox 控制項

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控制項，可使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, see [ComboBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，請參閱[下拉式方塊樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example populates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by binding the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to a collection object of type `VacationSpots`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會填入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>類型的集合物件的屬性`VacationSpots`。

trans-unit.source: The example also creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> that displays the selected item of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>會顯示選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines the collection object that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> in the preceding example binds to.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義的集合物件的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>在上述範例中會繫結至。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> class.
Occurs when the drop-down list of the combo box closes.

The following example shows how to assign event handlers and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownOpened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownClosed> events.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何指派事件處理常式以及如何處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownOpened>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownClosed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drop-down list of the combo box opens.
The following example shows how to assign event handlers and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownOpened> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownClosed> events.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何指派事件處理常式，以及處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownOpened>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownClosed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates or identifies the element used to display the specified item.
The element used to display the specified item.
Gets a value that indicates whether a combo box supports scrolling.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> supports scrolling; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />支援捲動; 否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>及其樣式中且具有捲動行為，自訂鍵盤<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>應該傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> has focus.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> has focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> 具有焦點，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the drop-down for a combo box is currently open.
<see langword="true" /> if the drop-down is open; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果下拉式清單已開啟。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> property to create a combo box with the drop down control opened when the combo box is initiated.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A>起始下拉式方塊時，開啟建立下拉式方塊的下拉式清單控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that enables or disables editing of the text in text box of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> can be edited; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />能編輯否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> properties specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> behaves when the user does one of the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性會指定如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>使用者執行下列其中之一時的行為：

trans-unit.source: Enters a string to select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 輸入要選取的項目中的字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Selects part of the string that is in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 選取 [文字] 方塊中的字串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Copies or pastes a value into the text box.
trans-unit.target: 複製或將值貼到文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的動作，使用者可以和不能採用依據的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `true`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> 是 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `false`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> 是 `false`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `true`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> 是 `true`

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -無法選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法複製或貼上在字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is equal to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> to display the currently selected item; when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is equal to `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is used for this purpose instead.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>等於`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>顯示目前選取項目，則當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>等於`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>改為使用針對此目的。

trans-unit.source: Note that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> only displays plain text, and that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> may include non-plain text content, such as images.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>只會顯示純文字格式，而且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>可能包含非純文字內容，例如影像。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following examples create <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> controls that contain images as items instead of text.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>包含影像，做為項目，而不是文字的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> displays the value returned by the image's <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>顯示的映像所傳回的值<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To avoid a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> with unexpected text, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.TextPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to assign text to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>使用未預期的文字，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.TextPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以指定要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Another solution is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 另一個解決方案是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The drop-down control of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> will not display the images but will display the text you assigned.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式清單控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>將不會顯示映像，但會顯示您所指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable" /> dependency property.
Specified item.
Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own <c>ItemContainer</c>.
<see langword="true" /> if the item is its own <c>ItemContainer</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets a value that enables selection-only mode, in which the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> properties specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> behaves when the user does one of the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性會指定如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>使用者執行下列其中之一時的行為：

trans-unit.source: Enters a string to select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 輸入要選取的項目中的字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Selects part of the string that is in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 選取 [文字] 方塊中的字串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Copies or pastes a value into the text box.
trans-unit.target: 複製或將值貼到文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的動作，使用者可以和不能採用依據的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `true`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> 是 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `false`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> 是 `false`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `true`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> 是 `true`

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -無法選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: - Can copy the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box, but cannot paste a string into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以複製中的字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字，但無法貼上到字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: - Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -可以輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: - Can copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -可以複製或貼上在字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `false`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> 是 `false`

trans-unit.source: - Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法複製或貼上在字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -可以選取中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法選取在字串的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -無法複製或貼上在字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is equal to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> to display the currently selected item; when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is equal to `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is used for this purpose instead.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>等於`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>顯示目前選取項目，則當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>等於`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>改為使用針對此目的。

trans-unit.source: Note that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> only displays plain text, and that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> may include non-plain text content, such as images.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>只會顯示純文字格式，而且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>可能包含非純文字內容，例如影像。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> with an editable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>與可編輯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, so the user cannot enter text into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`，因此使用者無法輸入的文字放到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly" /> dependency property.
Gets whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem" /> is highlighted.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem" /> is highlighted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem" />反白顯示; 否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the dependency property identifier field for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsSelectionBoxHighlighted%2A> is not public.
trans-unit.target: 不過，相依性屬性的識別項欄位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsSelectionBoxHighlighted%2A>並非公用。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot use the backing dependency property for property system operations that require the dependency property identifier, such as calls to <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法使用備份相依性屬性的屬性系統作業需要相依性屬性的識別項，例如呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, you can still use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsSelectionBoxHighlighted%2A> as a property trigger.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您仍然可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsSelectionBoxHighlighted%2A>屬性觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum height for a combo box drop-down.
A double that represents the height that is retrieved or the height to set.
trans-unit.target: Double 值，表示擷取的高度或若要設定的高度。

trans-unit.source: The default value as defined to the property system is a calculated value based on taking a one-third fraction of the system max screen height parameters, but this default is potentially overridden by various control templates.
trans-unit.target: 屬性系統定義的預設值是計算的值依據採取三分之一一部分系統最大的螢幕高度參數，但不同的控制項範本可能會覆寫此預設值。

trans-unit.source: Auto sizing is not the default, and will result in the drop down size potentially exceeding the available size in the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 自動調整大小不是預設值，並會在下拉式清單中可能會超過可用的大小，在父元素中的大小。

trans-unit.source: This is not typically desirable.
trans-unit.target: 這不是通常需要這樣做。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的值`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>套用屬性值 > 一節中所述的範圍限制。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述），後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` is inches; 1in==96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: Enables autosizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 啟用自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱＜備註＞。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.MaxDropDownHeight%2A> property to specify the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control's drop-down.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.MaxDropDownHeight%2A>屬性，以指定的高度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控制項的下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.MaxDropDownHeight" /> dependency property.
Called when <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate" /> is called.

Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownClosed" /> event.
Reports when a combo box's popup closes.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.DropDownOpened" /> event.
Reports when a combo box's popup opens.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> event.
Reports that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin" /> property changed.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCapturedChanged" /> event.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured" /> property changes.
Event data.
Invoked when a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown" /> attached routed event occurs.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event.
Called to report that the left mouse button was released.
Event data.
Invoked when a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyDown" /> attached routed event occurs.
Provides data for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs" />.
Responds to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> selection change by raising a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event.
Element used to display the specified item.
Specified item.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 準備項目，可能需要套用樣式、 設定繫結，並以此類推。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item that is displayed in the selection box.
The selected item.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> uses this property to show the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>顯示選取的項目中使用這個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: To get the selected item of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> outside of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>之外<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>屬於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Styling with ControlTemplates Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160041).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的範例，請參閱[使用 ControlTemplate 設定樣式範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160041)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem" /> dependency property.
Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string.
A composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 複合字串，指定如何格式化選取方塊中選取的項目，如果它顯示為字串。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemStringFormat" /> dependency property.
Gets the item template of the selection box content.
An item template.
trans-unit.target: 項目範本。

trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>屬於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Styling with ControlTemplates Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160041).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的範例，請參閱[使用 ControlTemplate 設定樣式範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160041)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplate" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> keeps the user's input or replaces the input with a matching item.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> keeps the user's input; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> replaces the input with a matching item The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />保持使用者的輸入。<see langword="false" />如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />輸入取代相符的項目已註冊的預設值是<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, when the user types a string into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> that matches one of its items, the item is selected and the text that the user typed is replaced.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，當使用者輸入的字串到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>符合其中一個項目、 在選取的項目和使用者輸入的文字會被取代。

trans-unit.source: This can cause the text that the user entered to change case.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會造成使用者輸入以變更大小寫的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> selects the matching item, but preserves the text that the user entered.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>選取相符的項目，但會保留使用者輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> contains the string, "Hello" (with a capital H) and the user enters "hello" (with a lowercase h).
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>包含字串"Hello"（以大寫 H），且使用者 （使用 h) 輸入 "hello"。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> selects the matching item, "Hello," in its collection and populates its text box with that string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>選取其集合中相符的項目，"Hello，"，並於其中填入它以該字串的文字框。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix%2A> is `true`, "Hello" is selected from the collection, but the text box says "hello."
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix%2A>是`true`，從集合中，選取"Hello"，但在文字方塊中顯示"hello"。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix" /> dependency property.

Gets or sets whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> that is open and displays a drop-down control will remain open when a user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.
<see langword="true" /> to keep the drop-down control open when the user clicks on the text area to start editing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 要保留下拉式控制項時，開啟使用者在開始編輯; 文字區域否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.StaysOpenOnEdit%2A> property to create a combo box whose drop-down control stays open while the user enters information into the text box.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.StaysOpenOnEdit%2A>建立下拉式方塊的下拉式清單控制項的屬性會保持開啟狀態時，使用者在文字方塊中輸入資訊。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.StaysOpenOnEdit" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.
The string of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取之項目的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> property is `true`, setting this property places initial text entered in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>屬性是`true`，將此屬性放在文字方塊中輸入的初始文字。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `false`, setting this value has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>是`false`，設定此值沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>

trans-unit.source: This example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.Text%2A> property can be used to set text into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> before the user makes a selection.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.Text%2A>屬性可以用來設定的文字放到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>之前的使用者進行選取。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.Text" /> dependency property.
